startInfo.text: I design and build interesting web applications.

text.part1: Hello! My name's Vlad and I'm currently involved in frontend development.
text.part2: I'mstarted seriously engaging in this wonderful craft a year and a half ago. During this time, I strive to create high-quality and visually appealing web applications.
text.part3: In 2023, I'm completed college and obtained a vocational degree and qualification as a technician programmer with honors
text.part4: I have proficiency in HTML, CSS (SASS preprocessor), JavaScript, TypeScript, the React library, the Node.js platform, and other technologies listed in the corresponding section
text.part5: Currently, I am seeking a position as a Frontend Developer in a company, where I can apply my knowledge and web development skills, and continue my professional growth.

contact.name: Contacts
contact.text: I am always open to discussing new projects and collaboration opportunities. Please feel free to contact me with any questions or proposals! My email is fir3norig@gmail.com.
